column4: HI all, I am trying to install vmware server and it wants my kernel headers.  uname -a reports 2.6.20-5-generic so I make it point to linux-headers-2.6.20-5-generic but it says the files are not of the proper version ... What can I do about this ?
It's probably looking for just the path to /usr/src/linux-headers...
: i gave it that path but it claims they are not of the running kernel version
